Digital Kitchen... $49.95 cutleryandmore. com OXO Good Grips 5 LB Food Scale w/... $29.99 Casa.com OXO Food Scale | Williams-Sonoma OXO Food Scale | Williams-Sonoma ( In stock ) A kitchen essential, this innovative digital scale is packed with user-friendly features. The display panel pulls away from the base, making it easy to check readings when your container... More
A kitchen essential, this innovative digital scale is packed with user-friendly features. The display panel pulls away from the base, making it easy to check readings when your container overhangs the platform. As you add ingredients, just press a button to reset the scale and view the updated reading. Display features large numerals and an optional backlight, and pulls away from the base for easy reading. Shows measurements in 1/8-oz. and 1-gram increments up to 11 lb. or 5 kg. Tare feature enables weighing multiple ingredients in a single container. As you weigh your ingredients, an easy-to-read indicator bar lets you know how much capacity is left on the scale. Stainless-steel platform removes for easy cleaning. Thin profile for convenient storage. Uses four AAA batteries (included). Less Williams-Sonoma 19 store reviews See Store Info /oxo-food-scale/cBh8DUErZIhWlOc2MnWmYg==/info $49.95 +$10.50 shipping Visit Store Food Portioning Scale - 6 Lb Cap, 0.001 Graduation Food Portioning Scale - 6 Lb Cap, 0.001 Graduation New ( In stock ) The Ohaus Food Portioning Scale is a rugged, multi-use portioning scale designed for use in food service applications. Ideally suited for food portioning and checkweighing, the FD Food... More
The Ohaus Food Portioning Scale is a rugged, multi-use portioning scale designed for use in food service applications. Ideally suited for food portioning and checkweighing, the FD Food portioning scale combines an easily cleaned design, fast display and high precision loadcell. Designed for use in restaurants, bakeries, food manufacturing and other areas requiring fast operation and flexibility, the Ohaus Food Portioning Scale offers durability and cleanliness in one economical design. 6 lbs. / 3 kg. capacity. 0.001 Graduation. 9"W x 12"D x 2-13/16"H overall. 15.80 L. 12.60 W. 7.30 H. Less Global Industrial 8 store reviews See Store Info /food-portioning-scale-6/v2qZ97bEK3NMDr5fGbRJ3A==/info $405.95 No Shipping Info Visit Store OXO Good Grips 5 LB Food Scale w/ Pull-Out Display OXO Good Grips 5 LB Food Scale w/ Pull-Out Display ( In stock ) OXO Good Grips user-friendly Food Scale with Pull-Out Display is perfect for weighing all ingredients. Weigh items directly on the platform, on a plate or in a bowl, and pull the display... More
OXO Good Grips user-friendly Food Scale with Pull-Out Display is perfect for weighing all ingredients. Weigh items directly on the platform, on a plate or in a bowl, and pull the display away from the base to prevent shadowing from large plates and bowls. Accurately measure ingredients when cooking and baking or stick to a diet by weighing portions. A weight indicator shows the capacity left on the Scale before maximum capacity is reached. Press the zero button to offset the weight of a container or to set the weight back to zero so you can add additional ingredients. The display features large, easy-to-read numbers which measure in 1/8-ounce (imperial) and 1-gram (metric) increments. The plastic platform can be removed for cleaning. The Scale has a 5-pound capacity and 2 AAA batteries are included. Dimensions: 1.1" x 7.9" x 5.65" Less Casa.com Store not rated See Store Info /oxo-good-grips-5-lb-food/H2LJdjmcHm9E99Fg2Q1KIA==/info Casa.com $29.99 +$4.99 shipping Visit Store OXO® Food Scale with Pullout Display OXO® Food Scale with Pullout Display ( In stock ) Modern technology steps in for precise ingredient measurements and portion control. Display pulls away from the base unit for easy reading beneath large dishes or containers (see additional... More
Modern technology steps in for precise ingredient measurements and portion control. Display pulls away from the base unit for easy reading beneath large dishes or containers (see additional photos). Easy-read imperial or metric measurement read-out features an optional backlight. Easy settings take into account containers and allow you to add ingredients. ( In stock ) Oxo’s user-friendly food scale with pull-out display is perfect for weighing all ingredients. Weigh items directly on the platform, on a plate or in a bowl, and pull the display away from... More
Oxo’s user-friendly food scale with pull-out display is perfect for weighing all ingredients. Weigh items directly on the platform, on a plate or in a bowl, and pull the display away from the base to prevent shadowing from large plates and bowls. Accurately measure ingredients when cooking and baking or stick to a diet by weighing portions. An optional backlight makes the display easier to read and a weight indicator shows the capacity left on the scale before maximum capacity is reached. Press the zero button to offset the weight of a container or to set the weight back to zero so you can add additional ingredients. The display features large, easy-to-read numbers which measure in 1/8-ounce (us) and 1-gram (metric) increments. The scale also measures volume in ml and cups for water-based ingredients, and features a conversion chart that slides out from the body to measure other popular ingredients like flour and oil. The stainless steel platform can be removed for cleaning. The scale has a 22-pound capacity and four aaa batteries are included. Less Amazon 1,806 store reviews See Store Info /oxo-good-grips-stainless/bVl95GSwWFcSZF9J7b0lJA==/info $69.99 Free Shipping Visit Store http://di111.shoppingshadow.com/images/di/65/44/51/38335565556235762d584f312d367354545867-100x100-0-0.jpg?p=WRkRMoku66&a;=1&c;=1&l;=3033102&t;=07%2F12%2F12%2004%3A34%3A37%20PM&r;=17&d;=99.99&rt;=mr Oxo Good Grips 10-piece Pop Container Set, Black Lids Oxo Good Grips 10-piece Pop Container Set, Black Lids Get free shipping on orders over $25! ( In stock ) The OXO Good Grips POP Containers are airtight, stackable and space-efficient, making it easy to keep your dry foods fresh and your kitchen organized. The Containers have a unique... More
The OXO Good Grips POP Containers are airtight, stackable and space-efficient, making it easy to keep your dry foods fresh and your kitchen organized. The Containers have a unique push-button mechanism that creates an airtight seal with just one touch. The button also serves as a handle to lift off the lid. The Containers are designed for modular stacking so that you can efficiently organize your countertop and pantry. In addition, with their square and rectangular shapes, the POP Containers make the most of any storage space, while their corners allow for easy pouring. 10-piece set includes: 1 4.0-quart Container, ideal for a 5 lb bag of flour or sugar. 1 2.5-quart Container, ideal size for rice, pasta, breadsticks. 1 2.4-quart Container, ideal for cookies, crackers. 1 2.1-quart Container, ideal for spaghetti, linguini, lasagna. 2 0.9-quart Containers, ideal for brown sugar, nuts. 2 0.5-quart Containers, ideal for tea bags, candy, sugar cubes. 2 0.3-quart Containers, ideal for spices, dried chilies, bouillon. They are also great for use in the home office, sewing room, play room and more; in fact, the Containers can be used in so many places that you’ll want them POPping up everywhere. The Container lids come apart for thorough cleaning. All POP Containers are BPA-free. Black Lids. The CAS SW Series Food Scale comes in multiple configuration to suit any type of application. All versions of the CAS SW scale are Legal For Trade, but there are three main lines. The first series of SW scales are just standard portion control scales that provide cost effective, basic weighing functions. The second series adds an IP66 rating (Waterproofing) so they can be used in damn and wet environments. The third series features an RS232 interface to connect with POS systems. Please view the configurations below. The OXO Good Grips POP Containers are airtight, stackable and space-efficient, making it easy to keep your dry foods fresh and your kitchen organized. The Containers have a unique push-button mechanism that creates an airtight seal with just one touch. The button also serves as a handle to lift off the lid. The Containers are designed for modular stacking so that you can efficiently organize your countertop and pantry. In addition, with their square and rectangular shapes, the POP Containers make the most of any storage space, while their corners allow for easy pouring. 5-piece set includes: 1 2.1-quart Container, ideal for spaghetti, linguini, lasagne. 1 1.5-quart Container, ideal for granola, beans, licorice. 2 0.9-quart Containers, ideal for brown sugar, nuts. 1 0.3-quart Container, ideal for spices, dried chilies, bouillon. They are also great for use in the home office, sewing room, play room and more; in fact, the Containers can be used in so many places that you’ll want them POPping up everywhere. The Container lids come apart for thorough cleaning. All POP Containers are BPA-free. Black Lids.
